H3.text: what currency should i take to turkey. Turkish lira

A4.text: The lira (Turkish: Türk lirası; sign: ₺; ISO 4217 code: TRY; abbreviation: TL) is the official currency of Turkey.

A5.text: It is also legal tender in the de facto state of the Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus.
